title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Cable Network Reliability with Agentic AI & Graphs (IND3332)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用智能体AI和图技术转变有线网络可靠性 (IND3332)
abstract: Join this technical deep-dive into Cox Communications' Service Health, an AWS-powered solution transforming network management into intelligent, autonomous operations. Discover how Cox achieves point-of-interest event isolation using Amazon Neptune Graph Database, processing sub-second telemetry across 26 million topology nodes and profiling events in seconds. Learn how Cox built network data foundations enabling Agentic AI with Amazon Bedrock and Strands Agents to proactively detect and isolate faults. Explore the AWS stack powering topology hygiene management and Cox's vision for fully autonomous network operations delivering faster outage detection, improved prioritization, and intelligent remediation at scale.
abstract_cn: 深入探讨Cox Communications的服务健康解决方案，这是一个由AWS驱动的方案，将网络管理转变为智能自主运营。了解Cox如何使用Amazon Neptune图数据库实现关注点事件隔离，在2600万拓扑节点上处理亚秒级遥测数据并在数秒内完成事件分析。学习Cox如何构建网络数据基础，通过Amazon Bedrock和Strands Agents实现代理AI，主动检测和隔离故障。探索支持拓扑卫生管理的AWS技术栈，以及Cox对全自主网络运营的愿景，实现更快的故障检测、改进的优先级排序和大规模智能修复。

presenter.name: Joseph Keller
presenter.title: VP Network Analytics and Reliability Enablement
